text: Denise Dorothy Coffey (12 December 1936 â€“ 24 March 2022) was an English actress, director and playwright. Coffey appeared as Sidonia in Waltz of the Toreadors (1962), Peg in Georgy Girl (1966), Soberness in Far from the Madding Crowd (1967), and Mrs E. in Vivian Stanshall's Sir Henry at Rawlinson End (1980). Coffey died on 24 March 2022 Salcombe, England at the age of 85. Michael Coveney, "Denise Coffey obituary", The Guardian, 28 March 2022.
